Filters#

Author#

comis.filters.author(name=None, id=None, verified_email=None, admin=None, friend=None, mod=None, blocked=None, premium=None, suspended=None, age=None)#

Filter posts by author attributes.

Examples

from comis import Client, submission
from comis.filters import author

class MyClient(Client):
    @author(mod=False, premium=False)
    @submission()
    async def stuff(self, content, mod):
        await mod.remove()
Parameters

  • name (Optional[str]) – Username of the author.

  • id (Optional[str]) – ID of the author.

  • verified_email (Optional[bool]) – Whether the author has a verified email.

  • admin (Optional[bool]) – Whether the author is a site admin.

  • friend (Optional[bool]) – Whether the author is a friend.

  • mod (Optional[bool]) – Whether the author is a moderator of the subreddit.

  • blocked (Optional[bool]) – Whether the author is blocked by yourself.

  • premium (Optional[bool]) – Whether the author has reddit premium.

  • suspended (Optional[bool]) – Whether the author is a suspended account.

  • age (Optional[datetime]) – Minimum of the author.

Flair#

comis.filters.flair(text=None, flaired=None, template_id=None, color=None, colour=None, type=None)#

Filter by flair properties.

Parameters

  • text (Optional[Union[str, Pattern]]) – Text or Regular Expression to match against flair text.

  • flaired (Optional[bool]) – Whether the post is flaired.

  • template_id (Optional[str]) – Template ID for flair.

  • color (Optional[str]) – Color for flair.

  • colour (Optional[str]) – Colour for flair.

  • type (Optional[str]) – Type for flair.

Karma#

comis.filters.karma_gt(total=None, *, post=None, comment=None, awardee=None, awarder=None, link=None)#

Filter posts by type of karma greater than the given value.

Parameters

  • total (Optional[int]) – The total karma to check against.

  • post (Optional[int]) – The post karma to check against.

  • comment (Optional[int]) – The comment karma to check against.

  • awardee (Optional[int]) – The awardee karma to check against.

  • awarder (Optional[int]) – The awarder karma to check against.

  • link (Optional[int]) – The link karma to check against.

Time#

comis.filters.time(days=None)#

Filter by time posted.

Parameters

days (Optional[list[Day]]) – Valid days of the week.

class comis.filters.Day(value)#

Enum for days of the week.

monday = 1#
tuesday = 2#
wednesday = 3#
thursday = 4#
friday = 5#
saturday = 6#
sunday = 7#
